title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 44 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 44 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: We have heard with our ears, O God, our fathers have told us, what work thou didst in their days, in the times of old.
lineList.cn: （可拉后裔的训诲诗，交与伶长）神阿，你在古时，我们列祖的日子，所行的事，我们亲耳听见了，我们的列祖，也给我们述说过。

lineList.en: How thou didst drive out the heathen with thy hand, and plantedst them; how thou didst afflict the people, and cast them out.
lineList.cn: 你曾用手赶出外邦人，却栽培了我们列祖。你苦待列邦，却叫我们列祖发达。

lineList.en: For they got not the land in possession by their own sword, neither did their own arm save them: but thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, because thou hadst a favour unto them.
lineList.cn: 因为他们不是靠自己的刀剑得土地，也不是靠自己的膀臂得胜。乃是靠你的右手，你的膀臂，和你脸上的亮光，因为你喜悦他们。

lineList.en: Thou art my King, O God: command deliverances for Jacob.
lineList.cn: 神阿，你是我的王，求你出令，使雅各得胜。

lineList.en: Through thee will we push down our enemies: through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us.
lineList.cn: 我们靠你要推倒我们的敌人。靠你的名要践踏那起来攻击我们的人。

lineList.en: For I will not trust in my bow, neither shall my sword save me.
lineList.cn: 因为我必不靠我的弓，我的刀也不能使我得胜。

lineList.en: But thou hast saved us from our enemies, and hast put them to shame that hated us.
lineList.cn: 惟你救了我们脱离敌人，使恨我们的人羞愧。

lineList.en: In God we boast all the day long, and praise thy name for ever. Selah.
lineList.cn: 我们终日因神夸耀，还要永远称谢你的名。（细拉）

lineList.en: But thou hast cast off, and put us to shame; and goest not forth with our armies.
lineList.cn: 但如今你丢弃了我们，使我们受辱，不和我们的军兵同去。

lineList.en: Thou makest us to turn back from the enemy: and they which hate us spoil for themselves.
lineList.cn: 你使我们向敌人转身退后。那恨我们的人任意抢夺。

lineList.en: Thou hast given us like sheep appointed for meat; and hast scattered us among the heathen.
lineList.cn: 你使我们当作快要被吃的羊，把我们分散在列邦中。

lineList.en: Thou sellest thy people for nought, and dost not increase thy wealth by their price.
lineList.cn: 你卖了你的子民，也不赚利。所得的价值，并不加添你的资财。

lineList.en: Thou makest us a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and a derision to them that are round about us.
lineList.cn: 你使我们受邻国的羞辱，被四围的人嗤笑讥刺。

lineList.en: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen, a shaking of the head among the people.
lineList.cn: 你使我们在列邦中作了笑谈，使众民向我们摇头。

lineList.en: My confusion is continually before me, and the shame of my face hath covered me,
lineList.cn: 我的凌辱，终日在我面前。我脸上的羞愧，将我遮蔽。

lineList.en: For the voice of him that reproacheth and blasphemeth; by reason of the enemy and avenger.
lineList.cn: 都因那辱骂毁谤人的声音，又因仇敌和报仇人的缘故。

lineList.en: All this is come upon us; yet have we not forgotten thee, neither have we dealt falsely in thy covenant.
lineList.cn: 这都临到我们身上。我们却没有忘记你。也没有违背你的约。

lineList.en: Our heart is not turned back, neither have our steps declined from thy way;
lineList.cn: 我们的心没有退后，我们的脚也没有偏离你的路。

lineList.en: Though thou hast sore broken us in the place of dragons, and covered us with the shadow of death.
lineList.cn: 你在野狗之处压伤我们，用死荫遮蔽我们。

lineList.en: If we have forgotten the name of our God, or stretched out our hands to a strange god;
lineList.cn: 倘若我们忘了神的名，或向别神举手，

lineList.en: Shall not God search this out? for he knoweth the secrets of the heart.
lineList.cn: 神岂不鉴察这事吗。因为他晓得人心里的隐秘。

lineList.en: Yea, for thy sake are we killed all the day long; we are counted as sheep for the slaughter.
lineList.cn: 我们为你的缘故终日被杀，人看我们如将宰的羊。

lineList.en: Awake, why sleepest thou, O Lord? arise, cast us not off for ever.
lineList.cn: 主阿，求你睡醒，为何尽睡呢。求你兴起，不要永远丢弃我们。

lineList.en: Wherefore hidest thou thy face, and forgettest our affliction and our oppression?
lineList.cn: 你为何掩面，不顾我们所遭的苦难，和所受的欺压。

lineList.en: For our soul is bowed down to the dust: our belly cleaveth unto the earth.
lineList.cn: 我们的性命伏于尘土。我们的肚腹紧贴地面。

lineList.en: Arise for our help, and redeem us for thy mercies' sake.
lineList.cn: 求你起来帮助我们，凭你的慈爱救赎我们。
